name: Jewel World Clash of Vikings
description:
Jewel World CLASH of VIKINGS ! Is an incredible new puzzle game! Come and discover a multitude of puzzles with an atmosphere coming from the world of the Vikings. Some trap has been placed ... You will have to rescue the Vikings in BONUS levels...

Play with 2 different mode... CLASSIC, play ZEN without time limit or life; QUEST, try to complete all puzzle !

Many levels of difficulty available, fun for all ages.

MAIN CHARACTERISTICS
- 2 Game mode. CLASSIC or QUEST
- Learn how to play easily and quickly.
- Many bonus chest
- BONUS Wheel
- Tons of levels with lots of challenges.
- Several levels of difficulty.
- CLASSIC: No LIFE, NO Time Limit
- You can play offline at any time.
- Amazing graphics and music to Vikings themes.
- Vikings Power available (Help Tools)

VIKINGS POWERS
You can use the Vikings Powe (Help Tools) to help you complete the Puzzles. The Vikings will help you solve more complicated puzzles.

SHOPPING
Jewel World CLASH of VIKINGS ! Uses a proper currency call SKOLD. You can use the SKOLDs to buy hints of any kind. There are several ways to get SKOLDs for FREE or you can get them through the in-app purchases.

FACEBOOK
Sign in to Facebook, you can invite, send / receive gifts with your friends and soon ... Even more ...


NOTES
Jewel World CLASH of VIKINGS ! Is a completely FREE game with banner ads. You can also listen to advertising videos to earn SKOLDs.


Like us on FACEBOOK
https://www.facebook.com/JewelWorldSK/


Have Fun !
